name: SPIN - Luke Davies x Aeneas Middleton

metadata.name: SPIN
metadata.description:
“Never underestimate the importance of having fun” - Randy Pausch

Inspired by this quote and the desire to take a step back from serious life this piece explores the concept of “fun” and how I visualise this idea. This piece is meant to lighten a room and inject an element of freedom to have fun.

Art by Luke Davies
Sound Design by Aeneas "Hardley Davidson" Middleton
